posts.message:
Good evening GEEKS,
I am working on an idea of a start up company (mobile app), i am looking for a mobile app programer so if there is any one who is willing to be part of it plz feel free to inbox me (students, fresher or experienced males or females are welcomed).

Is there any Chrome/FireFox extension, app or anything else can download photos album from facebook page?

- I tried many extensions but nothing worked.

Guys, I'm developing a back-end web service to be consumed by diff. mobile applications and/or web clients. I'm evaluating between 2 alternatives: 1) PHP and 2) NodeJS. I know deciding is a pretty subjective topic, so let me tell you the criteria I'm basing off the decision and I'd love to hear your comments. I'm leaning towards NodeJS but there is nothing better than collective wisdom especially among such a group of GEEKS :)

Criteria:
1) Availability of Skill Set: PHP is more abundant especially in Egypt but NodeJS is growing rapidly
2) Fit for application: NodeJS parallelism beats PHP on that front
3) Market Presence: PHP is leading of course but NodeJS is growing pretty fast
4) Ease of Coding: NodeJS is faster in the development cycle
5) Cost to Outsource: NodeJS tend to be more expensive just because they are less. But I think prices will converge pretty soon and more importantly a developer updating his/her skill set to cope with the market is likely to deliver better results as he keeps developing him/her self so price for quality should be the same or NodeJS would exceed in that bit

As mentioned, It's a pretty subjective pick but I'd love to hear your feedbacks and please mention other criteria that I might have missed.
(PS I'll post the requirement for someone to help build the codebase on EgyptianGeeksJobs when my membership is confirmed and I take the final decision)

Awaiting replies (and sorry for the long post)

السلام عليكم

من فضلكم سؤال: ممكن اعرف متوسط رواتب المبرمجين فى مصر كام خصوصا .net web developer

ومتوسط سعر الساعة ليهم واقصى عدد ساعات ممكن يشتغله يوميا لو بالساعة ؟

بصراحة معرض عليا شغل اون لاين ب 2000 شهريا وانا شايف انهم قليلين جدا او بالساعة 15 جنيه 6 ساعات يوميا

انا شغال بقالى 5 سنين

what does " outstanding balance " means in Prepaid cards ?
whenever i put balance in my card to purchase something it goes to the outstanding balance and the available balance is in minus ?!!

posts.description: Lots of techies where asking for a deployment tool for Angular 2 applications. Angular 2 loves Webpack. Webpack is a popular module bundler, a tool for bundling application source code in convenient chunks and for loading that code from a server into a browser.
